response.overview: In 'A Mother's Hope,' we follow the journey of Jacob Alexander, a heavily recruited high school basketball star, as he battles friends from his past on his quest to make it to the NBA. With the support of his coaches and a strong family, he overcomes the fiery darts set to take him down. When the system he was taught to believe in and an encounter with the law changes his destiny. Now in this riveting case of mistaken identity, his family searches for answers.
response.tagline: GOD IS TALKING, BUT ARE YOU LISTENING?
response.title: A Mother's Hope
